law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1606, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 91, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 252, Pt. XXXIV, sec. 5, effective April 25, 2006. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). This section was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts chs. 24 and 91, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
